page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: {LUCY AGED 9 On Sunday I get up at about 7.30.I get dressed ready to go to church.At about 9.30 Peter Saunders our choir master picks me up with the rest of the choir.We have a practice before church starts.At 10 o'clock we get our robes on.We get into pairs and process round the church singing.Then at 11 o'clock I go home.At about 2 o'clock we have lunch.We usually have chicken or lamb.After lunch at about 3.30 we go up to the tennis courts because my Mum usually plays tennis with Caroline Laws.At about 5 o'clock we have cheese and biscuits for tea.Then we watch television until we go to bed.
